name: olive-beauty
description: Olive Beauty E-commerce - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ecommerce" "npm run dev:admin"

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:ecommerce && npm run build:admin
